020package org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal;
021
022import static java.lang.String.CASE_INSENSITIVE_ORDER;
023import static java.util.Comparator.comparing;
024import static java.util.Locale.ROOT;
025import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.ABSTRACT;
026import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.DEFAULT;
027import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.FINAL;
028import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.PRIVATE;
029import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.PUBLIC;
030import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.STATIC;
031import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
032import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
033import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.SuppressableWarnings.CLASS_WITH_TOO_MANY_METHODS;
034import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal.ClassNameImpl.OBJECT;
035import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal.TypeNameImpl.VOID_PRIMITIVE;
036import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal.TypeSpecImpl.Kind.CLASS;
037import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal.Util.createDebugOutput;
038import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal.Util.union;
039import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.checkState;
040import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.hash;
041import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.isNull;
042import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.nonNull;
043import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
044import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNotEmptyArgument;
045import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireValidNonNullArgument;
046import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.capitalize;
047import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.decapitalize;
048import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.format;
049import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.isEmpty;
050import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.isNotEmptyOrBlank;
051
052import javax.lang.model.element.Modifier;
053import java.io.UncheckedIOException;
054import java.util.ArrayList;
055import java.util.Collection;
056import java.util.EnumSet;
057import java.util.HashSet;
058import java.util.List;
059import java.util.Optional;
060import java.util.Set;
061
062import org.apiguardian.api.API;
063import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
064import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.ValidationException;
065import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.CodeBlock;
066import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.FieldSpec;
067import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.JavaComposer;
068import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.MethodSpec;
069import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.SuppressableWarnings;
070import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.TypeName;
071import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.TypeSpec;
072
073/**
074 *  The implementation of
075 *  {@link TypeSpec}
076 *  for a class.
077 *
078 *  @author Square,Inc.
079 *  @modified   Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
080 *  @version $Id: ClassSpecImpl.java 936 2021-12-13 16:08:37Z tquadrat $
081 *  @since 0.2.0
082 *
083 *  @UMLGraph.link
084 */
085@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: ClassSpecImpl.java 936 2021-12-13 16:08:37Z tquadrat $" )
086@API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.2.0" )
087public final class ClassSpecImpl extends TypeSpecImpl
088{
089        /*---------------*\
090    ====** Inner Classes **====================================================
091        \*---------------*/
092    /**
093     *  The implementation of
094     *  {@link TypeSpec.Builder}
095     *  for a class.
096     *
097     *  @author Square,Inc.
098     *  @modified Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
099     *  @version $Id: ClassSpecImpl.java 936 2021-12-13 16:08:37Z tquadrat $
100     *  @since 0.2.0
101     *
102     *  @UMLGraph.link
103     */
104    @ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: ClassSpecImpl.java 936 2021-12-13 16:08:37Z tquadrat $" )
105    @API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.2.0" )
106    public static final class BuilderImpl extends TypeSpecImpl.BuilderImpl
107    {
108            /*------------*\
109        ====** Attributes **===================================================
110            \*------------*/
111        /**
112         *  The anonymous type arguments.
113         */
114        @SuppressWarnings( "InstanceVariableOfConcreteClass" )
115        private final CodeBlockImpl m_AnonymousTypeArguments;
116
117            /*--------------*\
118        ====** Constructors **=================================================
119            \*--------------*/
120        /**
121         *  Creates a new {@code BuilderImpl} instance.
122         *
123         *  @param  composer    The reference to the factory that created this
124         *      builder instance.
125         *  @param  name    The name of the type to build.
126         *  @param  anonymousTypeArguments  Anonymous type arguments.
127         */
128        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
129        public BuilderImpl( final JavaComposer composer, final CharSequence name, final CodeBlockImpl anonymousTypeArguments )
130        {
131            this( composer, Optional.of( requireNotEmptyArgument( name, "name" ).toString() ), anonymousTypeArguments );
132        }   //  BuilderImpl()
133
134        /**
135         *  Creates a new {@code BuilderImpl} instance for an anonymous type.
136         *
137         *  @param  composer    The reference to the factory that created this
138         *      builder instance.
139         *  @param  anonymousTypeArguments  Anonymous type arguments.
140         */
141        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
142        public BuilderImpl( final JavaComposer composer, final CodeBlockImpl anonymousTypeArguments )
143        {
144            this( composer, Optional.empty(), anonymousTypeArguments );
145        }   //  BuilderImpl()
146
147        /**
148         *  Creates a new {@code BuilderImpl} instance.
149         *
150         *  @param  composer    The reference to the factory that created this
151         *      builder instance.
152         *  @param  name    The name of the type to build.
153         *  @param  anonymousTypeArguments  Anonymous type arguments.
154         */
155        @SuppressWarnings( {"OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType", "CastToConcreteClass"} )
156        public BuilderImpl( final JavaComposer composer, final Optional<String> name, final CodeBlockImpl anonymousTypeArguments )
157        {
158            super( composer, CLASS, name );
159            m_AnonymousTypeArguments = anonymousTypeArguments;
160        }   //  BuilderImpl()
161
162            /*---------*\
163        ====** Methods **======================================================
164            \*---------*/
165        /**
166         *  {@inheritDoc}
167         */
168        @SuppressWarnings( "CastToConcreteClass" )
169        @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
170        @Override
171        public final BuilderImpl addAttribute( final FieldSpec fieldSpec, final boolean readOnly )
172        {
173            final var fieldSpecImpl = (FieldSpecImpl) requireValidNonNullArgument( fieldSpec, "fieldSpec", v -> v.hasModifier( PRIVATE ), $ -> format( "Field %s needs to be private", fieldSpec.name() ) );
174            addField( fieldSpecImpl );
175
176            final var fieldName = fieldSpecImpl.name();
177            final var propertyName = decapitalize( fieldName.startsWith( "m_" ) ? fieldName.substring( 2 )  : fieldName );
178
179            final Set<Modifier> modifiers = EnumSet.of( PUBLIC, FINAL );
180            if( fieldSpec.hasModifier( STATIC ) ) modifiers.add( STATIC );
181
182            final var accessor = getFactory().methodBuilder( propertyName )
183                .addModifiers( modifiers )
184                .returns( fieldSpecImpl.type() )
185                .addStatement( "return $N", fieldSpecImpl )
186                .build();
187            addMethod( accessor );
188
189            if( !(readOnly || fieldSpecImpl.hasModifier( FINAL )) )
190            {
191                final var param = getFactory().parameterBuilder( fieldSpecImpl.type(), "value", FINAL )
192                    .build();
193                final var setter = getFactory().methodBuilder( propertyName )
194                    .addModifiers( modifiers )
195                    .addParameter( param )
196                    .returns( VOID_PRIMITIVE )
197                    .addStatement( "$N = $N", fieldSpecImpl, param )
198                    .build();
199                addMethod( setter );
200            }
201
202            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
203            return this;
204        }   //  addAttribute()
205
206        /**
207         *  {@inheritDoc}
208         */
209        @Override
210        @SuppressWarnings( "CastToConcreteClass" )
211        public final BuilderImpl addMethod( final MethodSpec methodSpec )
212        {
213            final var methodSpecImpl = (MethodSpecImpl) requireNonNullArgument( methodSpec, "methodSpec" );
214            checkState( methodSpecImpl.defaultValue().isEmpty(), () -> new IllegalStateException( format( "%s %s.%s cannot have a default value", CLASS, getName().orElse( NAME_ANONYMOUS_TYPE ), methodSpecImpl.name() ) ) );
215            checkState( !methodSpecImpl.hasModifier( DEFAULT ), () -> new IllegalStateException( format( "%s %s.%s cannot be default", CLASS, getName().orElse( NAME_ANONYMOUS_TYPE ), methodSpecImpl.name() ) ) );
216
217            final var methodSpecs = getMethodSpecs();
218            if( composer().addDebugOutput() )
219            {
220                final var builder = methodSpecImpl.toBuilder( false );
221                createDebugOutput( true ).ifPresent( debug -> builder.addJavadoc( "\n$L\n", debug.asLiteral() ) );
222                methodSpecs.add( builder.build() );
223            }
224            else
225            {
226                methodSpecs.add( methodSpecImpl );
227            }
228
229            final var maxMethods = composer().getMaxMethods();
230            if( (maxMethods > 0) && (methodSpecs.size() >= maxMethods) )
231            {
232                addSuppressableWarning( CLASS_WITH_TOO_MANY_METHODS );
233            }
234
235            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
236            return this;
237        }   //  addMethod()
238
239        /**
240         *  {@inheritDoc}
241         */
242        @Override
243        @SuppressWarnings( "CastToConcreteClass" )
244        public final Builder addProperty( final FieldSpec fieldSpec, final boolean readOnly )
245        {
246            final var fieldSpecImpl = (FieldSpecImpl) requireValidNonNullArgument( fieldSpec, "fieldSpec", v -> v.hasModifier( PRIVATE ), $ -> format( "Field %s needs to be private", fieldSpec.name() ) );
247            addField( fieldSpecImpl );
248
249            final var fieldName = fieldSpecImpl.name();
250            final var propertyName = fieldName.startsWith( "m_" ) ? fieldName.substring( 2 ) : capitalize( fieldName );
251
252            final Set<Modifier> modifiers = EnumSet.of( PUBLIC, FINAL );
253            if( fieldSpec.hasModifier( STATIC ) ) modifiers.add( STATIC );
254
255            final var getter = getFactory().methodBuilder( "get" + propertyName )
256                .addModifiers( modifiers )
257                .returns( fieldSpecImpl.type() )
258                .addStatement( "return $N", fieldSpecImpl )
259                .build();
260            addMethod( getter );
261
262            if( !(readOnly || fieldSpecImpl.hasModifier( FINAL )) )
263            {
264                final var param = getFactory().parameterBuilder( fieldSpecImpl.type(), "value", FINAL )
265                    .build();
266                final var setter = getFactory().methodBuilder( "set" + propertyName )
267                    .addModifiers( modifiers )
268                    .addParameter( param )
269                    .returns( VOID_PRIMITIVE )
270                    .addStatement( "$N = $N", fieldSpecImpl, param )
271                    .build();
272                addMethod( setter );
273            }
274
275            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
276            return this;
277        }   //  addProperty()
278
279        /**
280         *  {@inheritDoc}
281         */
282        @Override
283        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
284        public final ClassSpecImpl build()
285        {
286            final var isAbstract = getModifiers().contains( ABSTRACT );
287
288            for( final var methodSpec : getMethodSpecs() )
289            {
290                checkState( isAbstract || !methodSpec.hasModifier( ABSTRACT ), () -> new ValidationException( format( "non-abstract type %s cannot declare abstract method %s", getName().orElse( NAME_ANONYMOUS_TYPE ), methodSpec.name() ) ) );
291            }
292
293            final var superclassIsObject = getSuperclass().equals( OBJECT );
294            final var interestingSupertypeCount = (superclassIsObject ? 0 : 1) + getSuperinterfaces().size();
295            checkState( getAnonymousTypeArguments().isEmpty() || interestingSupertypeCount <= 1, () -> new ValidationException( "anonymous type has too many supertypes" ) );
296
297            final var retValue = new ClassSpecImpl( this );
298
299            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
300            return retValue;
301        }   //  build()
302
303        /**
304         *  {@inheritDoc}
305         */
306        protected final Optional<CodeBlockImpl> getAnonymousTypeArguments() { return Optional.ofNullable( m_AnonymousTypeArguments ); }
307
308        /**
309         *  {@inheritDoc}
310         */
311        @Override
312        public final boolean isAnonymousClass() { return nonNull( m_AnonymousTypeArguments ); }
313
314        /**
315         *  {@inheritDoc}
316         */
317        @Override
318        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
319        public final BuilderImpl superclass( final TypeName superclass )
320        {
321            super.superclass( superclass );
322
323            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
324            return this;
325        }   //  superclass()
326    }
327    //  class BuilderImpl
328
329        /*------------*\
330    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
331        \*------------*/
332    /**
333     *  The anonymous type arguments for this type.
334     */
335    @SuppressWarnings( "InstanceVariableOfConcreteClass" )
336    private final CodeBlockImpl m_AnonymousTypeArguments;
337
338        /*--------------*\
339    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
340        \*--------------*/
341    /**
342     *  Creates a new {@code TypeClassSpecImpl} instance.
343     *
344     *  @param  builder The builder for this instance.
345     */
346    @SuppressWarnings( {"AccessingNonPublicFieldOfAnotherObject", "UseOfConcreteClass"} )
347    public ClassSpecImpl( final BuilderImpl builder )
348    {
349        super( builder );
350        m_AnonymousTypeArguments = builder.m_AnonymousTypeArguments;
351    }   //  ClassSpecImpl()
352
353    /**
354     *  Creates a dummy type spec for type-resolution in CodeWriter only while
355     *  emitting the type declaration but before entering the type body.
356     *
357     *  @param  type    The source type.
358     */
359    @SuppressWarnings( {"AccessingNonPublicFieldOfAnotherObject", "UseOfConcreteClass"} )
360    private ClassSpecImpl( final ClassSpecImpl type )
361    {
362        super( type );
363        assert isNull( type.m_AnonymousTypeArguments ) : "Not for anonymous classes";
364        m_AnonymousTypeArguments = type.m_AnonymousTypeArguments;
365    }   //  ClassSpecImpl()
366
367        /*---------*\
368    ====** Methods **==========================================================
369        \*---------*/
370    /**
371     *  {@inheritDoc}
372     */
373    @Override
374    public final Optional<CodeBlock> anonymousTypeArguments()
375    {
376        return Optional.ofNullable( m_AnonymousTypeArguments );
377    }   //  anonymousTypeArguments()
378
379    /**
380     *  {@inheritDoc}
381     */
382    @Override
383    protected final TypeSpecImpl createCopy() { return new ClassSpecImpl( this ); }
384
385    /**
386     *  Emits the type to the given code writer, using the layout as defined
387     *  by the Foundation library code.
388     *
389     *  @param  codeWriter  The target code writer.
390     *  @param  enumName    The name of the enum; can be {@code null}.
391     *  @param  implicitModifiers   The implicit modifiers.
392     *  @throws UncheckedIOException A problem occurred when writing to the
393     *      output target.
394     */
395    @SuppressWarnings( {"BoundedWildcard", "OptionalGetWithoutIsPresent", "CastToConcreteClass"} )
396    protected final void emit4Foundation( final CodeWriter codeWriter, final String enumName, final Set<Modifier> implicitModifiers ) throws UncheckedIOException
397    {
398        if( isNotEmptyOrBlank( enumName ) )
399        {
400            //---* Emit an enum constant *-------------------------------------
401            /*
402             * enum constants are implemented as anonymous types so this is
403             * called from an outer type spec.
404             */
405            codeWriter.emitJavadoc( getJavadoc() );
406            final Collection<AnnotationSpecImpl> annotations = new ArrayList<>( getAnnotations() );
407            getFactory().createSuppressWarningsAnnotation( getSuppressableWarnings() )
408                .map( a -> (AnnotationSpecImpl) a )
409                .ifPresent( annotations::add );
410            codeWriter.emitAnnotations( annotations, false );
411            codeWriter.emit( "$L", enumName );
412            if( !m_AnonymousTypeArguments.formatParts().isEmpty() )
413            {
414                codeWriter.emit( "( " );
415                codeWriter.emit( m_AnonymousTypeArguments );
416                codeWriter.emit( " )" );
417            }
418
419            if( getFieldSpecs().isEmpty() && getMethodSpecs().isEmpty() && innerClasses().isEmpty() )
420            {
421                //---* Avoid unnecessary braces "{}" *-------------------------
422                return;
423            }
424
425            codeWriter.emit(
426                """
427
428                {
429                """ );
430        }
431        else if( nonNull( m_AnonymousTypeArguments ) )
432        {
433            //---* Emit an anonymous type that is not an enum constant *-------
434            final var supertype = getSuperInterfaces().isEmpty() ? getSuperClass() : getSuperInterfaces().get( 0 );
435
436            codeWriter.emit( "new $T( ", supertype );
437            codeWriter.emit( m_AnonymousTypeArguments );
438            codeWriter.emit( """
439                 )
440                {
441                """ );
442        }
443        else
444        {
445            /*
446             * Push an empty type (specifically without nested types) for
447             * type-resolution.
448             */
449            codeWriter.pushType( createCopy() );
450
451            codeWriter.emitJavadoc( getJavadoc() );
452            final Collection<AnnotationSpecImpl> annotations = new ArrayList<>( getAnnotations() );
453            getFactory().createSuppressWarningsAnnotation( getSuppressableWarnings() )
454                .map( a -> (AnnotationSpecImpl) a )
455                .ifPresent( annotations::add );
456            codeWriter.emitAnnotations( annotations, false );
457            codeWriter.emitModifiers( modifiers(), union( implicitModifiers, CLASS.asMemberModifiers() ) );
458            codeWriter.emit( "$L $L", CLASS.name().toLowerCase( ROOT ), name().get() );
459            codeWriter.emitTypeVariables( getTypeVariables() );
460
461            final List<TypeNameImpl> extendsTypes = getSuperClass().equals( OBJECT ) ? List.of() : List.of( getSuperClass() );
462            final var implementsTypes = getSuperInterfaces();
463
464            if( !extendsTypes.isEmpty() )
465            {
466                codeWriter.emit( " extends" );
467                var firstType = true;
468                for( final var type : extendsTypes )
469                {
470                    if( !firstType ) codeWriter.emit( "," );
471                    codeWriter.emit( " $T", type );
472                    firstType = false;
473                }
474            }
475
476            if( !implementsTypes.isEmpty() )
477            {
478                codeWriter.emit( " implements" );
479                var firstType = true;
480                for( final var type : implementsTypes )
481                {
482                    if( !firstType ) codeWriter.emit( "," );
483                    codeWriter.emit( " $T", type );
484                    firstType = false;
485                }
486            }
487
488            codeWriter.popType();
489
490            codeWriter.emit(
491                """
492
493                {
494                """ );
495        }
496
497        codeWriter.pushType( this );
498
499        //---* Emit the class body *-------------------------------------------
500        codeWriter.indent();
501        var firstMember = true;
502
503        //---* Emit the inner types *------------------------------------------
504        if( !innerClasses().isEmpty() )
505        {
506            if( !firstMember ) codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
507            codeWriter.emit(
508                """
509                    /*---------------*\\
510                ====** Inner Classes **====================================================
511                    \\*---------------*/""" );
512            innerClasses().stream()
513                .sorted( comparing( t -> t.name().get(), CASE_INSENSITIVE_ORDER ) )
514                .map( t -> (TypeSpecImpl) t)
515                .forEachOrdered( t ->
516                {
517                    codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
518                    t.emit( codeWriter, null, CLASS.implicitTypeModifiers() );
519                } );
520            firstMember = false;
521        }
522
523        //--- Constants and attributes *---------------------------------------
524        if( !getFieldSpecs().isEmpty() )
525        {
526            final Collection<FieldSpecImpl> alreadyHandled = new HashSet<>();
527
528            //---* Emit the constants *----------------------------------------
529            final var constants = getFieldSpecs().stream()
530                .filter( f -> f.hasModifier( PUBLIC ) )
531                .filter( f -> f.hasModifier( STATIC ) )
532                .filter( f -> f.hasModifier( FINAL ) )
533                .filter( FieldSpecImpl::hasInitializer )
534                .sorted( comparing( FieldSpecImpl::name, CASE_INSENSITIVE_ORDER ) )
535                .toList();
536
537            if( !constants.isEmpty() )
538            {
539                if( !firstMember ) codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
540                codeWriter.emit(
541                    """    
542                        /*-----------*\\
543                    ====** Constants **========================================================
544                        \\*-----------*/""" );
545                constants.forEach( c ->
546                {
547                    codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
548                    c.emit( codeWriter, CLASS.implicitFieldModifiers() );
549                    alreadyHandled.add( c );
550                } );
551                firstMember = false;
552            }
553
554            //---* Emit the attributes *---------------------------------------
555            final var attributes = getFieldSpecs().stream()
556                .filter( f -> !alreadyHandled.contains( f ) )
557                .filter( f -> !(f.hasModifier( STATIC ) && f.hasModifier( FINAL )) )
558                .sorted( comparing( FieldSpecImpl::name, CASE_INSENSITIVE_ORDER ) )
559                .toList();
560
561            if( !attributes.isEmpty() )
562            {
563                if( !firstMember ) codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
564                codeWriter.emit(
565                    """
566                        /*------------*\\
567                    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
568                        \\*------------*/""" );
569
570                attributes.forEach( a ->
571                {
572                    codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
573                    a.emit( codeWriter, CLASS.implicitFieldModifiers() );
574                    alreadyHandled.add( a );
575                } );
576                firstMember = false;
577            }
578
579            //---* Static fields *---------------------------------------------
580            final var statics = getFieldSpecs().stream()
581                .filter( f -> !alreadyHandled.contains( f ) )
582                .sorted( comparing( FieldSpecImpl::name, CASE_INSENSITIVE_ORDER ) )
583                .toList();
584            if( !statics.isEmpty() || !getStaticBlock().isEmpty() )
585            {
586                if( !firstMember ) codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
587                codeWriter.emit(
588                    """
589                        /*------------------------*\\
590                    ====** Static Initialisations **===========================================
591                        \\*------------------------*/""" );
592
593                statics.forEach( s ->
594                {
595                    codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
596                    s.emit( codeWriter, CLASS.implicitFieldModifiers() );
597                    alreadyHandled.add( s );
598                } );
599
600                //---* Static Block *------------------------------------------
601                if( !getStaticBlock().isEmpty() )
602                {
603                    codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
604                    codeWriter.emit( getStaticBlock() );
605                }
606                firstMember = false;
607            }
608        }
609
610        //---* Constructors *--------------------------------------------------
611        final var constructors = getMethodSpecs().stream()
612            .filter( MethodSpecImpl::isConstructor )
613            .sorted( comparing( MethodSpecImpl::toString, CASE_INSENSITIVE_ORDER ) )
614            .toList();
615        if( !getInitializerBlock().isEmpty() || !constructors.isEmpty() )
616        {
617            if( !firstMember ) codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
618            codeWriter.emit(
619                """
620                    /*--------------*\\
621                ====** Constructors **=====================================================
622                    \\*--------------*/""" );
623
624            //---* Initializer block *-----------------------------------------
625            if( !getInitializerBlock().isEmpty() )
626            {
627                codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
628                codeWriter.emit( getInitializerBlock() );
629            }
630
631            //---* Emit the constructors *-------------------------------------
632            constructors.forEach( c ->
633            {
634                codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
635                c.emit( codeWriter, name(), CLASS.implicitMethodModifiers() );
636            } );
637            firstMember = false;
638        }
639
640        //---* Methods (static and non-static) *-------------------------------
641        final var methods = getMethodSpecs().stream()
642            .filter( m -> !m.isConstructor() )
643            .sorted( TypeSpecImpl::compareMethodSpecs )
644            .toList();
645        if( !methods.isEmpty() )
646        {
647            if( !firstMember ) codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
648            codeWriter.emit(
649                """
650                    /*---------*\\
651                ====** Methods **==========================================================
652                    \\*---------*/""" );
653
654            methods.forEach( m ->
655            {
656                codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
657                m.emit( codeWriter, name(), CLASS.implicitMethodModifiers() );
658            } );
659        }
660
661        codeWriter.unindent();
662        codeWriter.popType();
663
664        codeWriter.emit( "}" );
665        if( isEmpty( enumName ) && isNull( m_AnonymousTypeArguments ) )
666        {
667            codeWriter.emit( "\n//  $L $N", CLASS.name().toLowerCase( ROOT ), this );
668
669            /*
670             * If this type isn't also a value, include a trailing newline.
671             */
672            codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
673        }
674    }   //  emit4Foundation()
675
676    /**
677     *  Emits the type to the given code writer, using the layout as defined
678     *  by the original JavaPoet code.
679     *
680     *  @param  codeWriter  The target code writer.
681     *  @param  enumName    The name of the enum; can be {@code null}.
682     *  @param  implicitModifiers   The implicit modifiers.
683     *  @throws UncheckedIOException A problem occurred when writing to the
684     *      output target.
685     */
686    @SuppressWarnings( {"BoundedWildcard", "OptionalGetWithoutIsPresent", "CastToConcreteClass"} )
687    protected final void emit4JavaPoet( final CodeWriter codeWriter, final String enumName, final Set<Modifier> implicitModifiers ) throws UncheckedIOException
688    {
689        if( isNotEmptyOrBlank( enumName ) )
690        {
691            //---* Emit an enum constant *-------------------------------------
692            /*
693             * enum constants are implemented as anonymous types so this is
694             * called from an outer type spec.
695             */
696            codeWriter.emitJavadoc( getJavadoc() );
697            final Collection<AnnotationSpecImpl> annotations = new ArrayList<>( getAnnotations() );
698            getFactory().createSuppressWarningsAnnotation( getSuppressableWarnings() )
699                .map( a -> (AnnotationSpecImpl) a )
700                .ifPresent( annotations::add );
701            codeWriter.emitAnnotations( annotations, false );
702            codeWriter.emit( "$L", enumName );
703            if( !m_AnonymousTypeArguments.formatParts().isEmpty() )
704            {
705                codeWriter.emit( "(" );
706                codeWriter.emit( m_AnonymousTypeArguments );
707                codeWriter.emit( ")" );
708            }
709
710            if( getFieldSpecs().isEmpty() && getMethodSpecs().isEmpty() && innerClasses().isEmpty() )
711            {
712                //---* Avoid unnecessary braces "{}" *-------------------------
713                return;
714            }
715
716            codeWriter.emit( " {\n" );
717        }
718        else if( nonNull( m_AnonymousTypeArguments ) )
719        {
720            //---* Emit an anonymous type that is not an enum constant *-------
721            final var supertype = getSuperInterfaces().isEmpty() ? getSuperClass() : getSuperInterfaces().get( 0 );
722
723            codeWriter.emit( "new $T(", supertype );
724            codeWriter.emit( m_AnonymousTypeArguments );
725            codeWriter.emit( ") {\n" );
726        }
727        else
728        {
729            /*
730             * Push an empty type (specifically without nested types) for
731             * type-resolution.
732             */
733            codeWriter.pushType( createCopy() );
734
735            codeWriter.emitJavadoc( getJavadoc() );
736            final Collection<AnnotationSpecImpl> annotations = new ArrayList<>( getAnnotations() );
737            getFactory().createSuppressWarningsAnnotation( getSuppressableWarnings() )
738                .map( a -> (AnnotationSpecImpl) a )
739                .ifPresent( annotations::add );
740            codeWriter.emitAnnotations( annotations, false );
741            codeWriter.emitModifiers( modifiers(), union( implicitModifiers, CLASS.asMemberModifiers() ) );
742            codeWriter.emit( "$L $L", CLASS.name().toLowerCase( ROOT ), name().get() );
743            codeWriter.emitTypeVariables( getTypeVariables() );
744
745            final List<TypeNameImpl> extendsTypes = getSuperClass().equals( OBJECT ) ? List.of() : List.of( getSuperClass() );
746            final var implementsTypes = getSuperInterfaces();
747
748            if( !extendsTypes.isEmpty() )
749            {
750                codeWriter.emit( " extends" );
751                var firstType = true;
752                for( final var type : extendsTypes )
753                {
754                    if( !firstType ) codeWriter.emit( "," );
755                    codeWriter.emit( " $T", type );
756                    firstType = false;
757                }
758            }
759
760            if( !implementsTypes.isEmpty() )
761            {
762                codeWriter.emit( " implements" );
763                var firstType = true;
764                for( final var type : implementsTypes )
765                {
766                    if( !firstType ) codeWriter.emit( "," );
767                    codeWriter.emit( " $T", type );
768                    firstType = false;
769                }
770            }
771
772            codeWriter.popType();
773
774            codeWriter.emit( " {\n" );
775        }
776
777        codeWriter.pushType( this );
778
779        //---* Emit the class body *-------------------------------------------
780        codeWriter.indent();
781        var firstMember = true;
782
783        //---* Static fields *-------------------------------------------------
784        for( final var fieldSpec : getFieldSpecs() )
785        {
786            if( !fieldSpec.hasModifier( STATIC ) ) continue;
787            if( !firstMember ) codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
788            fieldSpec.emit( codeWriter, CLASS.implicitFieldModifiers() );
789            firstMember = false;
790        }
791
792        if( !getStaticBlock().isEmpty() )
793        {
794            if( !firstMember ) codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
795            codeWriter.emit( getStaticBlock() );
796            firstMember = false;
797        }
798
799        //--* Non-static fields *----------------------------------------------
800        for( final var fieldSpec : getFieldSpecs() )
801        {
802            if( fieldSpec.hasModifier( STATIC ) ) continue;
803            if( !firstMember ) codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
804            fieldSpec.emit( codeWriter, CLASS.implicitFieldModifiers() );
805            firstMember = false;
806        }
807
808        //---* Initializer block *---------------------------------------------
809        if( !getInitializerBlock().isEmpty() )
810        {
811            if( !firstMember ) codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
812            codeWriter.emit( getInitializerBlock() );
813            firstMember = false;
814        }
815
816        //---* Constructors *--------------------------------------------------
817        for( final var methodSpec : getMethodSpecs() )
818        {
819            if( !methodSpec.isConstructor() ) continue;
820            if( !firstMember ) codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
821            methodSpec.emit( codeWriter, name(), CLASS.implicitMethodModifiers() );
822            firstMember = false;
823        }
824
825        //---* Methods (static and non-static) *-------------------------------
826        for( final var methodSpec : getMethodSpecs() )
827        {
828            if( methodSpec.isConstructor() ) continue;
829            if( !firstMember ) codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
830            methodSpec.emit( codeWriter, name(), CLASS.implicitMethodModifiers() );
831            firstMember = false;
832        }
833
834        //---* Types (inner classes) *-----------------------------------------
835        for( final var typeSpec : innerClasses() )
836        {
837            if( !firstMember ) codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
838            ((TypeSpecImpl) typeSpec).emit( codeWriter, null, CLASS.implicitTypeModifiers() );
839            firstMember = false;
840        }
841
842        codeWriter.unindent();
843        codeWriter.popType();
844
845        codeWriter.emit( "}" );
846        if( isEmpty( enumName ) && isNull( m_AnonymousTypeArguments ) )
847        {
848            /*
849             * If this type isn't also a value, include a trailing newline.
850             */
851            codeWriter.emit( "\n" );
852        }
853    }   //  emit4JavaPoet()
854
855    /**
856     *  {@inheritDoc}
857     */
858    @Override
859    public final boolean equals( final Object o )
860    {
861        var retValue = this == o;
862        if( !retValue && (o instanceof ClassSpecImpl other) )
863        {
864            retValue = getFactory().equals( other.getFactory() ) && toString().equals( o.toString() );
865        }
866
867        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
868        return retValue;
869    }   //  equals()
870
871    /**
872     *  {@inheritDoc}
873     */
874    @Override
875    public final int hashCode() { return hash( getFactory(), toString() ); }
876
877    /**
878     *  {@inheritDoc}
879     */
880    @SuppressWarnings( "CastToConcreteClass" )
881    @Override
882    public final TypeSpecImpl.BuilderImpl toBuilder()
883    {
884        final var retValue = new BuilderImpl( getFactory(), name(), (CodeBlockImpl) anonymousTypeArguments().orElse( null ) );
885        retValue.getJavadoc().addWithoutDebugInfo( getJavadoc() );
886        retValue.getAnnotations().addAll( getAnnotations() );
887        retValue.getModifiers().addAll( modifiers() );
888        retValue.getTypeVariables().addAll( getTypeVariables() );
889        retValue.superclass( getSuperClass() );
890        retValue.getSuperinterfaces().addAll( getSuperInterfaces() );
891        retValue.getFieldSpecs().addAll( getFieldSpecs() );
892        retValue.getMethodSpecs().addAll( getMethodSpecs() );
893        retValue.getTypeSpecs().addAll( typeSpecs() );
894        retValue.getInitializerBlock().addWithoutDebugInfo( getInitializerBlock() );
895        retValue.getStaticBlock().addWithoutDebugInfo( getStaticBlock() );
896        retValue.getStaticImports().addAll( getStaticImports() );
897        retValue.addSuppressableWarning( getSuppressableWarnings().toArray( SuppressableWarnings []::new ) );
898
899        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
900        return retValue;
901    }   //  toBuilder()
902}
903//  class ClassSpecImpl
904
905/*
906 *  End of File
907 */
